name: update_individual_supplier_details
delete_individual_supplier_details
script:
if doc.parent_supplier:
    doc_name = frappe.db.get_value('Child Supplier Details',{'supplier_name':doc.name},'name')
    frappe.get_doc(dict(
        doctype = 'Child Supplier Details',
        parent = doc.parent_supplier,
        name = doc_name
    )).delete()

if doc.is_manager==0 and doc.report_manager!=None:
    doc_name = frappe.db.get_value('Report Member Details',{'supplier_name':doc.name},'name')
    frappe.get_doc(dict(
        doctype = 'Report Member Details',
        parent = doc.report_manager,
        name = doc_name
    )).delete()
